verses.verse: My <S%H7307>breath<s%> is <S%H2254>corrupt,<s%> my <S%H3117>days<s%> are <S%H2193>extinct,<s%> the <S%H6913>graves<s%> are ready for me.
Are there <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2049>mockers<s%> <S%H5978>with<s%> me? and doth not mine <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H3885>continue<s%> in their <S%H4784>provocation?<s%>
Lay <S%H7760>down<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> put me in a <S%H6148>surety<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> thee; <S%H4310>who<s%> is <S%H1931>he<s%> that will <S%H8628>strike<s%> <S%H3027>hands<s%> with me?

For <S%H3588><s%> thou hast <S%H6845>hid<s%> their <S%H3820>heart<s%> from <S%H4480>understanding:<s%> <S%H7922><s%> <S%H3651>therefore<s%> <S%H5921><s%> shalt thou <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7311>exalt<s%> them.
He that <S%H5046>speaketh<s%> <S%H2506>flattery<s%> to his <S%H7453>friends,<s%> even the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of his <S%H1121>children<s%> shall <S%H3615>fail.<s%>
He hath <S%H3322>made<s%> me also a <S%H4914>byword<s%> of the <S%H5971>people;<s%> and <S%H6440>formerly<s%> I <S%H1961>was<s%> as a <S%H8611>tabret.<s%>
Mine <S%H5869>eye<s%> also is <S%H3543>dim<s%> by reason of <S%H4480>sorrow,<s%> <S%H3708><s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H3338>members<s%> are as a <S%H6738>shadow.<s%>

Upright <S%H3477><s%> men shall be <S%H8074>astonished<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> <S%H2063>this,<s%> and the <S%H5355>innocent<s%> shall stir up <S%H5782>himself<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H2611>hypocrite.<s%>
The <S%H6662>righteous<s%> also shall <S%H270>hold<s%> on his <S%H1870>way,<s%> and he that hath <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H3027>hands<s%> shall be stronger and <S%H3254>stronger.<s%> <S%H555><s%>
But <S%H199><s%> as for you <S%H3605>all,<s%> do ye <S%H7725>return,<s%> and <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H4994>now:<s%> for I <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H4672>find<s%> one <S%H2450>wise<s%> man among you.
My <S%H3117>days<s%> are <S%H5674>past,<s%> my <S%H2154>purposes<s%> are broken <S%H5423>off,<s%> even the <S%H4180>thoughts<s%> of my <S%H3824>heart.<s%>
They <S%H7760>change<s%> the <S%H3915>night<s%> into <S%H3117>day:<s%> the <S%H216>light<s%> is <S%H7138>short<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of <S%H2822>darkness.<s%>
If <S%H518><s%> I <S%H6960>wait,<s%> the <S%H7585>grave<s%> is mine <S%H1004>house:<s%> I have <S%H7502>made<s%> my <S%H3326>bed<s%> in the <S%H2822>darkness.<s%>
I have <S%H7121>said<s%> to <S%H7845>corruption,<s%> <S%H859>Thou<s%> art my <S%H1>father:<s%> to the <S%H7415>worm,<s%> Thou art my <S%H517>mother,<s%> and my <S%H269>sister.<s%>
And <S%H346>where<s%> is <S%H645>now<s%> my <S%H8615>hope?<s%> as for my <S%H8615>hope,<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> shall <S%H7789>see<s%> it?
They shall go <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H905>bars<s%> of the <S%H7585>pit,<s%> <S%H518>when<s%> our <S%H5183>rest<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> is <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H6083>dust.<s%>
